title: The operators of the Ever Given may be forced to unload its 18,000 cargo containers onto other ships, report says
content:
1. The operators of the Ever Given may be forced to unload its 18,000 cargo containers onto other ships, report says  Yahoo News
  2. Egypt prepares for official opening of new portion of Suez canal  AP Archive
  3. Suez Canal receives giant dredger in planned upgrade  Al-Monitor
  4. EVER GIVEN grounding: whom to blame? But it's obvious!  Maritime Bulletin
  5. Report: Evergreen May Offload Ever Given's Cargo  The Maritime Executive
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 18,000個のコンテナを他の船に積むことを余儀なくされる可能性があるとのことです。
报道称，"Ever Given "号的运营商可能被迫将18000个货柜卸到其他船上。
報道稱，"Ever Given "號的運營商可能被迫將18000個貨櫃卸到其他船上。
